thesis_quality.description: Investment thesis is compelling, specific to this company, and supported by data from the materials

risk_identification.description: Key risks are correctly identified, appropriately prioritized, and include realistic mitigants

valuation_judgment.description: Valuation view is reasonable for the sector/situation with appropriate rationale and consideration of deal dynamics

projection_critique.description: Management projections are critically assessed with specific concerns or validations rather than generic acceptance

actionability.description: Diligence items are specific and actionable, recommendation is clear with supporting rationale
